properties.Name_of_th: Kande Arawa canal ( and Rathpaha ella anicut)
properties.Observatio: The anicut is built using soil and stones. The total length of canal is 1Km. This canal remain an earthen canal.  6 acres of paddy is cultivated from this canal. some sections are in severely dilapidated due to farmers encroaching on the canal  reserve a
properties.Descriptio:
Construction of Concrete anicut of 3.5 m length and (total height) height 2.0 m.

Clearing the site 

Common excavation for foundation or quarry materials and haul the surplus up to 30m by Manually.

Plywood form work including making, fixing & removing

properties.Observatio: The total length of canal is 2Km. Some sections of this canal  have been developed. (H=0.3m, W=0.3m) 75 Acres of paddy is cultivated from this canal. some sections are in severely dilapidated due to farmers encroaching on the canal  reserve and the canal
